summary: Tested Videographer Section feature for photo-sharing gallery. Backend APIs (16/17 tests passed, 1 skipped). Frontend videographer upload page and public gallery video display working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Video thumbnail preview overlay intercepts clicks on tag buttons below it. Users need to scroll down or use force click to select tags when a video URL is entered.

action_items: Consider adding pointer-events-none to the video preview overlay in VideographerUpload.jsx to prevent click interception
critical_code_review_comments: VideographerUpload.jsx line 242: The absolute positioned overlay div intercepts pointer events. Consider adding pointer-events-none class.
Video section management in GalleryDetail.jsx (lines 2196-2310) is well implemented with proper featured video handling, contributor link generation, and video grid display.
seed_data_creation: Created test videos via contributor upload and photographer API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Videographer Section feature fully tested. Backend video APIs working: create video section, generate contributor link, upload video as contributor, upload video as photographer, set featured, update video, delete video, public gallery videos. Frontend VideographerUpload page at /v/{link} working. VideoSection component displays videos correctly in public gallery with featured video, tags, and thumbnails. Minor UI issue: video preview overlay intercepts clicks on tag buttons.

features_tested.create_video_section: PASS - Video sections can be created with type='video'
features_tested.generate_contributor_link: PASS - Contributor links generated for video sections use /v/ prefix
features_tested.add_youtube_video: PASS - Videos can be added with company name, URL, and tag
features_tested.set_featured_video: PASS - Videos can be set as featured
features_tested.delete_video: PASS - Videos can be deleted by photographer
features_tested.public_gallery_videos: PASS - VideoSection component displays videos with featured badge, tags, and play button
